name: Secure Legal Contract Summarization (On-Prem)
description: Summarize sensitive legal contracts while preserving confidentiality by running on-prem or private VPC NLP. Includes automated PII redaction, clause extraction, and human-in-the-loop legal review.

banned_tools: Public cloud file storage for source documents
Model training on client data without opt-in

llm_insights: Summaries should cite clause locations to aid legal review.
Embedding search accelerates retrieval of similar clauses.
llm_recommended_approach: Run local summarization and NER models; apply PII redaction before inference; use embeddings+FAISS for clause retrieval; require human approval before release.
